name: get_web_links_id_get_shared_link
description: Gets the information for a shared link on a web link.

web_link_id.description: The ID of the web link.

fields.description:
Explicitly request the `shared_link` fields
to be returned for this item.

$block:
Web links are objects that point to URLs. These objects
are also known as bookmarks within the Box web application.

Web link objects are treated similarly to file objects,
they will also support most actions that apply to regular files.

$ul: **etag**: The entity tag of this web link. Used with `If-Match`
**id**: The unique identifier for this web link
**type**: `web_link`
**name**: The name of the web link
**sequence_id**
**url**: The URL this web link points to
**created_at**: When this file was created on Boxâ€™s servers.
**created_by**
**description**: The description accompanying the web link. This is
**item_status**: Whether this item is deleted or not. Values include `active`,
**modified_at**: When this file was last updated on the Box
**modified_by**
**owned_by**
**parent**
**path_collection**
**purged_at**: When this file will be permanently deleted.
**shared_link**
**trashed_at**: When this file was moved to the trash.
